CustomField.formula: IF( Converted_from_Legacy__c , IF(ISBLANK( SB_No_Nights__c ) , TEXT(DAY( SB_Date__c ))&"/"&TEXT(MONTH(SB_Date__c))&"/"&TEXT(YEAR(SB_Date__c)) , SB_No_Nights__c ), "")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Data here has come from information on the linked legacy order. Not to be used for POE orders.
CustomField.label: SB Date or # Nights
